summary: Build fails with TypeScript module resolution errors for @temporalio packages when running `npm run build` in the SDK monorepo. The issue was resolved by running `npx lerna clean -- -f && npm ci && npm run build` to properly clean and reinstall dependencies.
userImpact: Developers cannot build the SDK from source without performing a full clean rebuild with specific command flags.
rootCause: Stale or incomplete node_modules state from previous builds, requiring full cleanup and reinstallation via lerna clean and npm ci.
proposedFix: Run `npx lerna clean -- -f && npm ci && npm run build` instead of just `npm run build`.
workaround: Execute lerna clean with -f flag followed by npm ci before building: `npx lerna clean -- -f && npm ci && npm run build`
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved by running proper cleanup and reinstall commands; the solution was confirmed working by the issue reporter.
keyQuote: Thank you, that worked! npx lerna clean -- -f && npm ci && npm run build
